document.full_text: iraq's fiery anti-american cleric moqtada al-sadr will "escalate military resistance" and unleash his mehdi army militia if u.s. troops fail to leave iraq as scheduled this year, his aides said on saturday.
document.title: iraqi cleric warns of violence if u.s. troops don't go
lines_and_colors: iraq's fiery anti-american cleric moqtada al-sadr will "escalate military resistance" and unleash his mehdi army militia if u.s. troops fail to leave iraq as scheduled this year, his aides said on saturday.
